content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 48-55)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5) - working with water at 99 units
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5) - now with 49 coal remaining
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5) - operational with steam at 81.6 units
- Connected water pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Connected steam pipe network (positions -3.5,2.5 to -2.5,6.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 8.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
(No changes from previous report)

### Steel Production Line at position (18.5, 15.5)
(No changes from previous report)

### Iron Smelting Column at position (12.0, 15.0)
(No changes from previous report)

## ERROR TIPS

### Surveying and placement issues (steps 48,50,53,54)
- Implement proper integer coordinate handling for placement
- Develop systematic area scanning algorithms
- Create clear space detection functions before placement attempts

### Code execution errors (step 49)
- Ensure range() parameters are integers
- Implement type checking for coordinate calculations
- Add validation for all numerical operations

### Infrastructure analysis failures (steps 51,52)
- Correctly handle pipe group attributes (fluid property access)
- Implement proper steam pipe detection logic
- Verify entity properties before accessing them

### Power network expansion (step 55)
- Verify chest placement positions are clear
- Monitor power pole placement constraints
- Implement proper power network documentation

### Persistent issues from previous report
- Maintain proper placement distances
- Continue monitoring water obstructions
- Verify entity references before use
- Ensure production line input materials
- Maintain resource management systems

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- steam_pipes: List[PipeGroup] - Attempted reference to steam pipes
- water_pipes: List[PipeGroup] - Reference to water pipe network
- build_radius: float - Used for placement calculations
- power_poles: List[Entity] - References to power infrastructure
- production_buildings: List[Entity] - References to factory components
- clear_space_positions: List[Position] - Potential build locations
